short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to keep custom daily notes, without sharing any data anywhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will remind you to fill up your own custom Google Form, whenever you open a new tab, once a day at your own convenient time. To use it, just create a custom Google Form, be it to track your everyday tasks, physical fitness, mental well-being, or anything under the sun. Provide the link to the form in the extension, and you're good to go!
The responses to the form are stored in your own Google Drive, and you've total control over it. There is no external storage associated with this extension, as data privacy is our primary goal.
